name: Elastick
description:
Made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. Only Method of Movement is to Bungee Yourself Across the Screen. The goal of the game is to reach the checkered flag at the ends of each level.

Controls: Use Mouse to control direction of Movement, Space or Click to Bungee, and R to Restart. There are also options on the top of the screen that do some of these things.
